paragraphs.text:
%md
### Antes de comenzar
#### En máquina virtual
1. Lanzar terminal
1. Actualizar repo:
```sh
cd diplodatos_bigdata
git pull
```
1. Lanzar [Zeppelin](http://zeppelin.apache.org/):
```sh
cd
cd spark/zeppelin-0.8.2-bin-all
./bin/zeppelin-daemon.sh start
```
1. En navegador abrir [http://localhost:8080](http://localhost:8080)
1. Seleccionar `Import note`
1. Elegir json en `diplodatos_bigdata/clases/04_dataframes_tablas/note.json`
2. Seleccionar `Clase 04 - Dataframes y Tablas`

msg.data:
Antes de comenzar

En máquina virtual

  1. Lanzar terminal

  2. Actualizar repo:

    cd diplodatos_bigdata
git pull

  3. Lanzar Zeppelin:

    cd
cd spark/zeppelin-0.8.2-bin-all
./bin/zeppelin-daemon.sh start
  4. En navegador abrir http://localhost:8080
  5. Seleccionar Import note
  6. Elegir json en diplodatos_bigdata/clases/04_dataframes_tablas/note.json
  7. Seleccionar Clase 04 - Dataframes y Tablas

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Dataframes y Tablas (ejemplo)

paragraphs.title: Lectura
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

flightsInDF = spark.read.load("../../diplodatos_bigdata/ds/flights.csv",
                    format="csv", header=True, inferSchema=True)
           
flightsInDF.count()

paragraphs.title: Dataframe vuelos:
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

z.show(flightsInDF.limit(10))

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Descripción de columnas
paragraphs.text:
println(s"""%table
Col    \t Nombre \t Descripción
1  \t  Year              \t 1987-2008
2  \t  Month             \t 1-12
3  \t  DayofMonth        \t 1-31
4  \t  DayOfWeek         \t 1 (Monday) - 7 (Sunday)
5  \t  DepTime           \t actual departure time (local, hhmm)
6  \t  CRSDepTime        \t scheduled departure time (local, hhmm)
7  \t  ArrTime           \t actual arrival time (local, hhmm)
8  \t  CRSArrTime        \t scheduled arrival time (local, hhmm) (CRS = computer reservation system)
9  \t  UniqueCarrier     \t unique carrier code
10 \t  FlightNum         \t flight number
11 \t  TailNum           \t plane tail number
12 \t  ActualElapsedTime \t in minutes
13 \t  CRSElapsedTime    \t in minutes
14 \t  AirTime           \t in minutes
15 \t  ArrDelay          \t arrival delay, in minutes
16 \t  DepDelay          \t departure delay, in minutes
17 \t  Origin            \t origin IATA airport code
18 \t  Dest              \t destination IATA airport code
19 \t  Distance          \t in miles
20 \t  TaxiIn            \t taxi in time, in minutes
21 \t  TaxiOut           \t taxi out time in minutes
22 \t  Cancelled           \t was the flight cancelled?
23 \t  CancellationCode  \t reason for cancellation (A = carrier, B = weather, C = NAS, D = security)
24 \t  Diverted          \t 1 = yes, 0 = no
25 \t  CarrierDelay      \t in minutes
26 \t  WeatherDelay      \t in minutes
27 \t  NASDelay          \t in minutes
28 \t  SecurityDelay     \t in minutes
29 \t  LateAircraftDelay \t in minutes
""")

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

msg.data:
Col    	 Nombre 	 Descripción
1  	  Year              	 1987-2008
2  	  Month             	 1-12
3  	  DayofMonth        	 1-31
4  	  DayOfWeek         	 1 (Monday) - 7 (Sunday)
5  	  DepTime           	 actual departure time (local, hhmm)
6  	  CRSDepTime        	 scheduled departure time (local, hhmm)
7  	  ArrTime           	 actual arrival time (local, hhmm)
8  	  CRSArrTime        	 scheduled arrival time (local, hhmm) (CRS = computer reservation system)
9  	  UniqueCarrier     	 unique carrier code
10 	  FlightNum         	 flight number
11 	  TailNum           	 plane tail number
12 	  ActualElapsedTime 	 in minutes
13 	  CRSElapsedTime    	 in minutes
14 	  AirTime           	 in minutes
15 	  ArrDelay          	 arrival delay, in minutes
16 	  DepDelay          	 departure delay, in minutes
17 	  Origin            	 origin IATA airport code
18 	  Dest              	 destination IATA airport code
19 	  Distance          	 in miles
20 	  TaxiIn            	 taxi in time, in minutes
21 	  TaxiOut           	 taxi out time in minutes
22 	  Cancelled           	 was the flight cancelled?
23 	  CancellationCode  	 reason for cancellation (A = carrier, B = weather, C = NAS, D = security)
24 	  Diverted          	 1 = yes, 0 = no
25 	  CarrierDelay      	 in minutes
26 	  WeatherDelay      	 in minutes
27 	  NASDelay          	 in minutes
28 	  SecurityDelay     	 in minutes
29 	  LateAircraftDelay 	 in minutes

paragraphs.title: Algunas columnas importantes
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark 

flightsInDF.select("UniqueCarrier", "FlightNum", "DepDelay", "ArrDelay", "Distance").show()

paragraphs.title: Esquema
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

flightsInDF.printSchema

paragraphs.title: Vuelos retrasados (> 15')
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

delayedDF = flightsInDF.select("UniqueCarrier", "DepDelay").filter("DepDelay > 15").cache()
# Notar cache

z.show(delayedDF)

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Cantidad
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

print("Cantidad de vuelos retrasados por más de 15': ", delayedDF.count())

paragraphs.title: User Defined Functions (UDF)
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType

#* Función que define si un vuelo está retrasado
#* Si el retraso es > que 15' devuelve 1
#* si no 0
#* Si no está definida devuelve 0
# ********************************************************/

def isDelayed(time):
    if time == "NA":
        return 0 
    elif int(time) > 15: 
        return 1 
    else:
        return 0

# UDF que define si un vuelo está retrasado

isDelayedUDF = udf(isDelayed, IntegerType())

paragraphs.title: Nuevo Dataframe usando UDF
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

# Nuevo Dataframe con algunas columnas y con una nueva indicando si el vuelo está retrasado

flightsDF = flightsInDF.select("Year", "Month", "DayofMonth", "DayOfWeek", "CRSDepTime", "UniqueCarrier", "FlightNum", 
                    "DepDelay", "ArrDelay", "Origin", "Dest", "TaxiIn", "TaxiOut", "Distance",
                    isDelayedUDF("DepDelay").alias("IsDepDelayed")).cache()

z.show(flightsDF)

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Porcentaje de vuelos demorados
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

from pyspark.sql.functions import sum, count

percDelayedDF = flightsDF.agg((sum("IsDepDelayed") * 100 / count("*")).alias("Porcentaje de vuelos retrasados")).cache()

# z.show(percDelayedDF)

firstRow = percDelayedDF.first()

porcentaje = firstRow.asDict()["Porcentaje de vuelos retrasados"]

print("%html Porcentaje de vuelos demorados: {}%".format(porcentaje))

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Promedio de Taxi-out
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

from pyspark.sql.functions import avg

promTODF= flightsDF.select("Origin", "Dest", "TaxiOut") \
         .groupBy("Origin", "Dest").agg(avg("TaxiOut").alias("AvgTaxiOut")) \
         .orderBy("AvgTaxiOut", ascending=False)
         
z.show(promTODF)

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Ejercicio
paragraphs.text:
%md
Averiguar el promedio de Taxi-in por origen y destino.

msg.data: Averiguar el promedio de Taxi-in por origen y destino.

paragraphs.text:
%md
## SQL Plano

paragraphs.title: Creación de tabla temporal
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

flightsDF.createOrReplaceTempView("flightsTbl")

paragraphs.title: Tabla vuelos
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

resDF = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM flightsTbl LIMIT 10")

z.show(resDF)

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Tabla en interprete SQL de Zeppelin
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT * FROM flightsTbl LIMIT 10

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: UDF en SQL plano
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

isDelayed # ya la definimos

# Registración de UDF para usar con tablas
spark.udf.register("isDelayedTabUDF", isDelayed)

paragraphs.title: Cantidad de retrasos en llegadas por empresa
paragraphs.text:
%sql

SELECT UniqueCarrier, SUM(isDelayedTabUDF(ArrDelay)) AS NumArrDelays FROM flightsTbl GROUP BY UniqueCarrier

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Promedio de retrasos en llegadas por empresa
paragraphs.text:
%sql

SELECT UniqueCarrier, AVG(ArrDelay) AS AvgTimeDelay FROM flightsTbl WHERE isDelayedTabUDF(ArrDelay) == 1 GROUP BY UniqueCarrier

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Version con SQL programático
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

# Promedio de retrasos por empresa

flightsDF.filter(isDelayedUDF("ArrDelay") == 1) \
    .groupBy("UniqueCarrier") \
    .agg(avg("ArrDelay")) \
    .show()

paragraphs.title: Ejercicio
paragraphs.text:
%md
Encontrar la distancia de vuelo promedio por empresa.

msg.data: Encontrar la distancia de vuelo promedio por empresa.

paragraphs.text: %sql

paragraphs.title: Retrasados y en horario por día de la semana
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT DayOfWeek, CASE WHEN isDelayedTabUDF(ArrDelay) = 1 THEN 'delayed' ELSE 'ok' END AS Delay, COUNT(1) AS Count
FROM flightsTbl
GROUP BY DayOfWeek, Delay
ORDER BY DayOfWeek
/* Graficar con barras: key=DayOfWeek, Groups=Delay, Values=Count */

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Retrasados y en horario por hora
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT CAST(CRSDepTime / 100 AS INT) AS Hour, CASE WHEN isDelayedTabUDF(DepDelay) = 1 THEN 'delayed' ELSE 'ok' END AS Delay, COUNT(1) AS Count
FROM flightsTbl
GROUP BY Hour, Delay
ORDER BY Hour

%md

## Lectura/Escritura

paragraphs.title: Guardar como archivo Orc
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

flightsDF.write.format("orc").mode("overwrite").save("flights.orc")

paragraphs.title: Save modes
paragraphs.text: println(s"""%table Modo \t Significado %html "error" (default) \t Si existe se genera una excepción. %html "append" \t Si existe se agrega al final. %html "overwrite" \t Si existe se borra y se crea una nueva. %html "ignore" \t Si existe no se guarda. Similar a CREATE TABLE IF NOT. """)

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

msg.data: Modo Significado %html "error" (default) Si existe se genera una excepción. %html "append" Si existe se agrega al final. %html "overwrite" Si existe se borra y se crea una nueva. %html "ignore" Si existe no se guarda. Similar a CREATE TABLE IF NOT.

paragraphs.title: Cargar desde archivo Orc
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

testDF = spark.read.format("orc").load("flights.orc")

z.show(testDF)

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark print("%html Cantidad de filas en original: ", flightsDF.count()) print("
Cantidad de filas en guardado: ", testDF.count())

paragraphs.title: Tablas persistentes
paragraphs.text:
%md

### Tablas permanentes

* `createOrReplaceTempView` crea **tablas** temporales (desaparecen cuando se destruye  `SparkSession`).
* `saveAsTable` 
    - guarda dataframes en *HiveMetastore* de forma permanente y
    - permita utilizar SQL plano sobre ella.

msg.data:
Tablas permanentes

  • createOrReplaceTempView crea tablas temporales (desaparecen cuando se destruye SparkSession).
  • saveAsTable
    • guarda dataframes en HiveMetastore de forma permanente y
    • permita utilizar SQL plano sobre ella.

paragraphs.title: Guardado como tabla
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

flightsDF.write.format("orc").mode("overwrite").saveAsTable("flightsPermTbl")

#antes usamos
#flightsDF.createOrReplaceTempView("flightsTbl")

paragraphs.title: Ejercicio
paragraphs.text:
%md
Calcular la cantidad de vuelos que parten de cada aeropuerto y guardar el resultado en una tabla permanente.

msg.data: Calcular la cantidad de vuelos que parten de cada aeropuerto y guardar el resultado en una tabla permanente.

paragraphs.title: Agregando nombres de empresas
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
# en carriers.csv están los nombres
carriersDF = spark.read \
                .load("../../diplodatos_bigdata/ds/carriers.csv", format="csv", header=True, inferSchema=True)

z.show(carriersDF.limit(5))

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

[{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Join
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

from pyspark.sql.functions import col

flCarrDF = flightsDF.join(carriersDF, col("Code") == col("UniqueCarrier")) \
                .withColumnRenamed("Description","CarrierName")

flCarrDF.count()
z.show(flCarrDF.limit(5))

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

[{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Join con broadcast
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

from pyspark.sql.functions import col, broadcast

flCarrDF = flightsDF.join(broadcast(carriersDF), col("Code") == col("UniqueCarrier")) \
                .withColumnRenamed("Description","CarrierName")

flCarrDF.count()
z.show(flCarrDF.limit(5))

paragraphs.title: Ejercicio
paragraphs.text:
%md
Utilizando la información en el archivo `airports.csv` cambiar los códigos de los aeropuertos por sus nombres y agregar sus coordenadas. Hacerlo con SQL programático (usando dataframes).

##### Ayuda:

Puede ser útil el método `drop` que aparece en [Doc API Datasets](http://spark.apache.org/docs/2.1.1/api/scala/index.html#org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset).

Ayuda:

Puede ser útil el método drop que aparece en Doc API Datasets.
